cleaned_text: Aura Cleansing Bath Kit Aura Cleansing Bath Kit includes every spiritual bath tool you need to for a cleansing ritual bath to remove negativity, spiritual blockages and to promote healing. We use powerful ingredients with reiki charged crystals,oils, herbs and dead sea salt minerals that charge the bathwater with purifing and healing vibrations as each product is handcafted with the intention to cleanse your chakras and revitalize your aura. All products are 100% pure and organic and handmade in California from the highest quality fair trade ingredients. Bath Ritual Kit Includes: ~White Purification Candle 100% Organic Soy & Coconut Wax ~Aura Cleansing Herbal Tea ~Aura Cleansing Herbal Bath Soak with Herbs & Raw Amber -100% Organic Herbs and Cotton Sachet ~Aura Cleansing Salt Scrub with Herbs and supercharged with crystals on the bottom ~Palo Santo & Selenite Bundle + Aura Cleansing Instructions
